title: Parsley and Fruits
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant that offers many vegetarian and a few vegan choices like salads with roasted veggies or tofu, focaccia and wok. Also has a smoothie and juice bar and a wide range of craft beers.
